document_data.name: ''Potion of Delay Poison''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of delay poison''''' were magic brews that slowed effects of venoms and [[poison]]s when consumed.
document_data.Powers: ''Delay poison potions'' were bottled versions of the ''[[slow poison]]'' spell. When imbibed, the potion slowed harmful effects of poisons for three hours, giving the consumer precious time to find remedy or healing.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''potions of delay poison'' were used by the members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]], occupying the ruined elven city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Notable Users: *[[Buchembrallor]], a young [[green dragon]] who laired on [[Cape Velen]] in [[County Fyraven]] of [[Tethyr]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
